sentences.en: After pinpointing their location via satellite tracker, rescue crews drilled a narrow hole down into the shaft, pumping in air to pressurize the chamber and keep the water at bay.
sentences.cn: 在通过卫星追踪器确定了矿工们在地下所处位置后，救援人员钻开了一个窄洞，然后泵入空气进行增压将水阻挡住；

sentences.en: Always pressurize a regulator slowly, while standing with the cylinder valve between you and the regulator.
sentences.cn: 总是站得使钢瓶阀门位于你和调整器之间,对调整器慢慢加压.

sentences.en: Do not pressurize mattress with high pressure pumps.
sentences.cn: 不要用高压气泵给气垫加压.

sentences.en: Gas generator rocket can pressurize a high - pressure feed system.
sentences.cn: 燃气发生器能使高压输送系统增压.

sentences.en: He thought she was trying to pressurize him.
sentences.cn: 他觉得她正试图对他施压。

sentences.en: Pressurize the vessel to e . g . 0.2 MPa ( overpressure ) and vent.
sentences.cn: 对反应釜加压如加压至0.2MPa ( 超压 ) 然后放空.

sentences.en: Pumps to transport or pressurize gases are called compressors , Blowers, or fans.
sentences.cn: 用来输送气体或使气体增压的泵类称为压缩机 、 鼓风机或风扇.

sentences.en: The bicycle tires were flattened. I need pressurize them.
sentences.cn: 轮胎没气了,我的脚踏车须要打气.

sentences.en: The captain will pressurize the cabin for the passengers'comfort.
sentences.cn: 船长将为船舱增压,以保证乘客舒适.

sentences.en: The engines, the APU, or a pneumatic ground cart can pressurize the pneumatic manifold.
sentences.cn: 气源总管靠发动机, APU或地面气源车增压.

sentences.en: The fuselage & engine thethe MD 500 D The difference are, self - pressurize fuel takethe air inlet strainer.
sentences.cn: 机身 和 发动机采用MD500D民用型的设计, 区别在于加装自密封燃油箱、发动机进气道过滤器.

sentences.en: The hopper bottom sword is double close set, edge is pressurize rigorous.
sentences.cn: 出料口底刀为双重闭合装置,刀口密封严密.

sentences.en: The plane's cabin failed to pressurize and the jet had to land in Seattle.
sentences.cn: 由于飞机机舱无法保持恒定气压,该喷气式客机不得不在西雅图着陆.

sentences.en: The priinting ink is automatic circulated and peneumatic pressurize the ink scrape.
sentences.cn: 印刷版辊采用无轴气顶装置.

sentences.en: The stove and cylinder valve's copulae, use tie - in double pressurize device.
sentences.cn: 卡炉与气瓶阀门的接合部位采用接头双重密封装置.

sentences.en: To pressurize the air a supercharger must spin rapidly -- more rapidly than the engine itself.
sentences.cn: 为了要压缩空气,机械增压机的叶片必须快速地旋转 —— 甚至要比引擎本身转得还要快.

words.tran_cn: 加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机
增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入

trans.tran_en: to increase the pressure in (an enclosure, such as an aircraft cabin) in order to maintain approximately atmospheric pressure when the external pressure is low

trans.tran_cn: 对…施加压力，维持（某物内部的）大气压力水平，给…增压
